title: Jimmy Butler will pay your grocery bill
text:
We have discovered a lot about Jimmy Butler from the fabulous feature on him in Chicago Magazine .
We learned the Bulls guard removed the rearview mirror from his car because symbolically he doesn’t like to look back at the past.
Another tidbit in the story reveals that Jimmy Buckets will pay your grocery bill. No, really.
From Chicago Magazine:
(Butler’s less-than-idyllic upbringing may explain the roots of one ritual that has become a rule with him and his roomies: When you go to the grocery store, you pay the bill of the person behind you in line. “I don’t care how many groceries they have. It could be a 99-cent ice-cream cone or a $2,000 grocery bill,” says Butler. “We have been so blessed. It’s fun.”)
Be sure to thank Jimmy, but watch out for him when you pull out of the grocery parking lot.
People are losing their minds that Jimmy Butler has no rearview mirror
